content: That's really helpful information. I've been thinking a lot about my gender expression and how I want to present myself to the world. I've been feeling more comfortable with they/them pronouns and I've been experimenting with different hairstyles and fashion styles that feel more androgynous to me. I've also been considering therapy sessions to explore my feelings further and I've already booked an appointment with a gender-affirming therapist for next month. Do you think that's a good idea?
